channel.title: Minority Rule Hub
channel.description:
# Welcome to Minority Rule! Credit for the original game idea goes to Ddynamo on the Town of Salem Forums.
[color=transparent].[/color]
## Gameplay Minority rule is played in rounds. Each round, the host randomly selects a number of rooms equal to ⅓ of the living players rounded down (never less than two). You must choose one room to enter by sending the host your pick in a private message. When everybody has submitted a room, the players in the room with the most people are eliminated. However, most rooms also have a special effect of some kind, which can act either in your favor or to your detriment. Once there are less than three living players, everybody that is still alive is crowned a winner.
## Rules 1. Follow the global forum rules. 2. Respect the host and their decisions. 3. Send a room within a timely manner. The host may modkill you if you are holding up the game. 4. You may communicate privately with other players, but the host must be included in any such conversation. 5. Have fun.
[color=transparent].[/color]
## Rooms **[color=skyblue]Air [/color]** - A random picker becomes light. **[color=#801080]Betrayal [/color]**- If this room is tied for the minority, it gains infinite picks and becomes the majority. **[color=black]Death [/color]**- Everyone who picks this dies, even if it is not the majority. **[color=#DFDFDF]Dice [/color]**- Everyone who picks this is given a random status. **[color=#BFBF00]Divide [/color]**- Everyone who picks this counts as half. **[color=lightbrown]Earth [/color]**- A random picker becomes heavy. **[color=#800000]Evil [/color]**- All pickers become cursed. **[color=#FF00FF]False [/color]**- This room does nothing, but it takes the name of another random room. **[color=#8000FF]Force [/color]**- A random person who did pick this will change to a random room in the current pool. **[color=#BF0080]Gravity [/color]**- A random person who did not pick this will change to this room. **[color=Cornflowerblue]Holy [/color]**- A random picker becomes a saint. All other pickers become cursed. **[color=#800080]Illusion [/color]**- This room takes the effect of another secret item before the start of the round. **[color=#808080]Insanity [/color]**- A random picker becomes insane. **[color=#00BFFF]Life [/color]**- If nobody picks this, everybody dies. **[color=green]Luck [/color]**- If this room is the majority, then one random picker will survive. If this is not the majority, then one random picker will die. **[color=#000050]Majority[/color]** - If this room is the majority, the items with the second most votes will be the majority. **[color=#FFBF40]Multiply [/color]**- Everyone who picks this counts as two. **[color=sienna]Mundane [/color]**- This room literally does nothing. **[color=dark]Murder [/color]**- One random picker becomes a Serial Killer **[color=darkred]Mystery [/color]**- Everyone who picks this is given a random status. They are not informed which status they received. **[color=#505050]Permanency [/color]**- If picked by anyone, this room will also be in the pool for the next round. Once this room is the majority, it is removed from the pool for all future rounds. **[color=#509090]Protection [/color]**- All pickers are immune to death this round for any reason other than the majority. A random picker becomes a bodyguard. **[color=#0080FF]Purity [/color]**- Everyone who picks this loses all statuses. **[color=#FF0000]Rejuvinate [/color]**- Everyone who picks this becomes healthy. **[color=#00EF00]Spite [/color]**- A random picker will becomes cursed. **[color=Steelblue]Secrecy[/color]** - All pickers become cultists. **[color=blue]Unity [/color]** - If all living players pick this, nobody will die due to the majority. **[color=#006030]Ritual [/color]** - All pickers get the soulbound status. **[color=#282828]Graveyard [/color]** - If nobody picks this room, three random dead players are revived. **[color=#ffafa0]Duplicate [/color]** - Takes the effect of the room with the most pickers (at the time this room activates).
## Statuses [color=#408000]Bodyguard [/color]- Nobody who picks the same room as you can die for any reason other than the majority. If anyone who would die without your intervention is saved, you will die instead. [color=Steelblue]Cultist[/color] - If there are any cultists, then there will be an item that only its members may pick. It will be denoted in [brackets]. [color=#804080]Cursed[/color]- You will die next round unless your status is removed or your death is prevented. This status is removed afterwards. [color=#FF0000]Healthy[/color] - You cannot die for any reason except for the majority. Once your death is prevented by this status, this status will be removed. [color=#808080]Insane[/color] - You must pick the majority or you will die. [color=skyblue]Light[/color] - You do not count as a picker for the next round. This status is removed afterwards. [color=lightbrown]Heavy[/color] - Your pick counts as two picks for the next round. This status is removed afterwards. [color=Cornflowerblue]Saint[/color]- You are immune to death. Once your death is prevented by this status, this status will be removed. [color=#0000BF]Serial Killer[/color] - A random person who picks the same room as you will die. [color=#006030]Soulbound [/color] - If you lose this status you will die.
[color=transparent].[/color]
## Games **[url=https://forum.imperium42.com/t/minority-rule-1-methnor-and-gingerbeardgentleman-win/6898]Minority Rule 1[/url]** **Hosted by:** orangeandblack5 **Status:** Completed **Winner(s):** Methnor, gingerbeardgentleman
**[url=https://forum.imperium42.com/t/minority-rule-2-sketch-is-new-host/11031]Minority Rule 2[/url]** **Hosted by:** Sketch **Status:** Completed **Winner(s):** Hippolytus
**[url=https://forum.imperium42.com/t/minority-rule-3-this-time-its-personnel-kid-signups-open/16347]Minority Rule 3[/url]** **Hosted by:** Methnor **Status:** Completed **Winner(s):** Ashe
**[url=https://forum.imperium42.com/t/minority-rule-4-christmas-edition/29967]Minority Rule 4: Christmas Edition[/url]** **Hosted by:** Hippolytus **Status:** Completed **Winner(s):** NozBugz, Strangle
**[url=https://forum.imperium42.com/t/minority-rule-5-love-is-in-the-air/42613]Minority Rule 5: Valentine's Edition[/url]** **Hosted by:** Marluxion **Status:** Completed **Winner(s):** 3DT_CheesyKnives, Ashe
**[url=https://forum.imperium42.com/t/minority-rule-6-easter-and-passover-pesach-edition-celeste-and-nozbugz-wins/55450]Minority Rule 6: Easter Edition[/url]** **Hosted by:** Sam17z **Status:** Completed **Winner(s):** Celeste_Ludenberg and NozBugz
**[url=https://forum.imperium42.com/t/minority-rule-7-game-over-strangle-wins/62261]Minority Rule 7[/url]** **Hosted by:** Hippolytus **Status:** Completed **Winner(s):** Strangle
**[url=https://forum.imperium42.com/t/minority-rule-8-end-maximusprime-and-sam-wins/72252]Minority Rule 8[/url]** **Hosted by:** Pug **Status:** Completed **Winner(s):** MaximusPrime and Sam17z
**[url=https://forum.imperium42.com/t/minority-rule-9-the-worst-party-ever-game-over-nothing-happened-with-style/74922?u=orangeandblack5]Minority Rule 9[/url]** **Hosted by:** Icibalus **Status:** Completed **Winner(s):** MaximusPrime, Meteoro, and DatBird
**[url=https://forum.imperium42.com/t/minority-rule-10-risk-edition/80749]Minority Rule 10: Risk Edition[/url]** **Hosted by:** Braixen **Status:** Completed **Winner(s):** Marshal, Nuclear Burrito
**[Minority Rule Royale](https://forum.throneoflies.com/t/minority-rule-royale-signups/87020?u=marluxion)** **Hosted by:** Marluxion **Status:** Completed **Winner(s)**: Intensify

item.title: Minority Rule Hub
item.dc:creator: Sketch
item.description:
I added a lot of rooms to the Facebook games I was hosting. See if you like any of them.

Graveyard - If nobody picks this, 3 dead players are revived randomly.

Coliseum - If there are exactly two pickers in this room, they both die.

Divination - One random picker will gain the Divine status.

Divine - You may choose to be told the amount of players in your selected room after everyone has chosen. You will not be told if it is Majority or not. You will be given the option to change your room. Once you use this ability, you lose your Divine status.

Ritual - All players who choose this room become Soulbound. If they lose this status, they will die.

Normalcy - People who pick this room do not count towards the Majority unless they have a status.

Joker - If this room is the minority or tied for minority, everyone in this room loses their statuses.

Guardian - A random picker gains both the Saint status and the Bodyguard status.

Gemini - Two random pickers gain the Gemini status.

Gemini - You must pick 2 rooms per round. You die if either of your picks is a room that becomes majority.

https://docs.google.com/document/d/1cwK92TnWScbudNtsR3hswEE88BpRB-WSaSPd2vmD1a4/edit?usp=sharing

Read full topic
